alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Dixie; Franklin; Gadsden; Gulf; Holmes; Jackson; Jefferson; Lafayette; Leon; Liberty; Madison; Taylor; Wakulla; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 15 at 5:50PM EDT until June 15 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 308 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM EDT /9 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 17 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA DIXIE FRANKLIN GADSDEN JEFFERSON LAFAYETTE LEON LIBERTY MADISON TAYLOR WAKULLA IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA BAY CALHOUN GULF HOLMES JACKSON WALTON WASHINGTON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABE SPRINGS, ADAMS BEACH, ALMA, ALPINE HEIGHTS, APALACHICOLA, ARGYLE, ATHENA, BARKER STORE, BAY CITY, BENNETT, BETHEL, BEVERLY, BLOUNTSTOWN, BLUE SPRINGS, BONIFAY, BOYD, BRADFORDVILLE, BROWNTOWN, BUCELL JUNCTION, BUCK SIDING, BUCKVILLE, CABBAGE GROVE, CAIRO, CALLAWAY, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CARBUR, CARRABELLE, CASA BLANCO, CENTER RIDGE, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHATTAHOOCHEE, CHERRY LAKE, CHIPLEY, CHIPLEY MUNICIPAL AIRPORT, CLARKSVILLE, CLUSTER SPRINGS, COBB CROSSROADS, COOKS HAMMOCK, CROSS CITY, CROSS CITY AIRPORT, CRYSTAL LAKE, DALKEITH, DAY, DE FUNIAK SPRING AIRPORT, DE FUNIAK SPRINGS, DILLS, DRIFTON, DURHAM, ECONFINA, EUCHEEANNA, FESTUS, FIVE POINTS, FORT GADSDEN, FRINK, GRACEVILLE, HANSON, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HILLIARDVILLE, HINES, HOLMES COUNTY AIRPORT, HONEYVILLE, HOPEWELL, HOWARD CREEK, JARROTT, JONESBORO, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, LEONIA, LITTMAN, LOVETT, LYNN HAVEN, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MADISON, MALONE, MARIANNA, MARYSVILLE, MAYO, MIDWAY, MONTICELLO, NEW HOPE, NIXON, OAK GROVE, ODENA, OLD TOWN, ORANGE HILL, PANAMA CITY, PERRY, PINETTA, POPLAR HEAD, PORT ST. JOE, QUINCY, QUINCY AIRPORT, RICHTER CROSSROADS, SANTA CLARA, SCOTTS FERRY, SIMSVILLE, SNEADS, SOPCHOPPY, ST. MARKS, SWEETWATER, TALLAHASSEE, TILTON, WAKULLA SPRINGS, WETUMPKA, WEWAHITCHKA, WHITE CITY, AND YELLOW JACKET.
